biotools.summary: Database stores structural, physicochemical and pharmacophoric properties of small molecules. For each compound a single 3D conformer is stored along with over 1600 calculated descriptor values (molecular properties). A very efficient method for unique compound recognition is demonstrated by making use of small subgroups of the descriptors.

bioschemas.name: EDULISS
